mapper.sql: ADD_NO , MEM_NO , ADD_POST , ADD_NAME , ADD_DETAIL , ADD_NICK , ADD_RECEIVER , ADD_PHONE
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT JOIN IMAGE ON PRO_NO = IMG_PRONO WHERE IMG_NO = "1" AND PRO_WR = #{proWr} AND PRO_DATE = #{proDate}
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS M JOIN ADDRESS A ON M.MEM_NO = A.MEM_NO WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS M JOIN ADDRESS A ON M.MEM_NO = A.MEM_NO WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTR(A.ADD_NO, 4) AS UNSIGNED) LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS M JOIN ADDRESS A ON M.MEM_NO = A.MEM_NO WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{sId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS SET ADD_POST = #{ADD_POST}, ADD_NAME = #{ADD_NAME}, ADD_DETAIL = #{ADD_DETAIL}, ADD_NICK = #{ADD_NICK}, ADD_RECEIVER = #{ADD_RECEIVER}, ADD_PHONE = #{ADD_PHONE} WHERE ADD_NO = #{ADD_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}) AS BUYNAME, (SELECT MEM_TEL FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}) AS BUYTEL, (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{PRO_WR}) AS SELLER, PRO_NAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{PRO_NO}
